item.title: Building a Complete Android App + Backend With Claude
item.description: There’s been a lot of discourse lately about LLMs and how useful they are. I’ve said before that I’m not a huge fan of LLMs and I have a lot of conceptual problems, that range anywhere from “it’s horrible for the climate and a violation of copyright”, to “it’s another step in the Big Tech oligarchy taking over every aspect of our lives and making them measurably worse”. Those things worry me a lot still, and I don’t have a clever solution to them.
